frontMatter.title: Speaker
frontMatter.summary: Vik is an active speaker and guest lecturer at various national conferences and academic forums. His topics include clinical medicine, digital and global health, entrepreneurship and innovation, Medicaid/Medicare, patient engagement, product development and technology, social determinants of health, and telemedicine.

prev.title: Entrepreneur
prev.summary: Vik started his first company, FIMRC, almost 20 years ago to improve access to health care for underserved populations. He has since co-founded or served as a senior executive for several venture-backed health technology companies in Columbus, New York City, Los Angeles, and San Francisco.

next.title: Technology
next.summary: Vik did residency training in general surgery and has been practicing medicine since 2007. He is currently licensed in 16 states (AZ, CA, DC, FL, GA, IL, MA, MI, NC, NY, OH, PA, UT, VA, WA, WI) and is clinically active as a private practitioner and as an on-call physician at UCSF Medical Center and Main Line Health.
